cast.name: 克里斯蒂亚诺·罗纳尔多 Cristiano Ronaldo
弗兰克·里贝里 Franck Ribéry

introduction: The Last Game is a story about risky football versus safe football.Perfect Inc. is a company run by a scientist who creates clones of Nike athletes Cristiano Ronaldo, Neymar Jr, Wayne Rooney, Zlatan Ibrahimović, Andrés Iniesta, Franck Ribery, David Luiz and Tim Howard.  These clones are precise and efficient, and they are genetically made without the capability to take risks.The scientist wants to prove that riskless football is a more effective way to play and a superior expression of the beautiful game. Ronaldo Fenomeno and the original players disagree, and they are willing to risk everything to prove the scientist wrong.There is only one way to know who is right: the Last Game.
